robot_capabilities.aquaRover: A precision robot with a soft-grip robotic arm. Works with another robot to lift and carry sensitive objects without damage.
robot_capabilities.duneRunner: A stable robot with lifting arms. Teams up to carry and balance fragile or heavy items during transport.
robot_capabilities.shoreHauler: A mounting robot equipped with a multi-tool robotic arm. Can drill, clamp, and fix objects securely on walls, stands, or platforms.

robot_morphology.aquaRover: Payload: ~30 kg, Speed: 0–2.5 m/s, Weight: 20 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 500 mm, Arm Reach: 400 mm, Grip Type: Soft-touch, Coordination Mount: Enabled
robot_morphology.duneRunner: Payload: ~30 kg, Speed: 0–3.5 m/s, Weight: 20 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 500 mm, Lifting Arms: Dual-side clamps, Balance Assist: Enabled
robot_morphology.shoreHauler: Payload: ~20 kg, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 15 kg, Size: 500 × 400 × 300 mm, Arm Reach: 450 mm, Arm Tools: Drill, Clamp, Magnetic Gripper, Tool Swapping Enabled
